mapper.select: select t1.*, t2.user_name as creatorName, t3.user_name as reviserName, t4.user_name as executiveName from t_task_sub t1 left join t_user t2 on t1.creator_id = t2.id left join t_user t3 on t1.reviser_id = t3.id left join t_user t4 on t1.executiveId = t4.id where t1.status != 0 and t1.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
